bridges

Class AbstractVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • bridges.AbstractVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AbstractVertex>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BSTNode, DLListNode, StackNode, Vertex

    public abstract class AbstractVertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AbstractVertex>
    Abstract graph vertex, with an unspecified adjacency construct. Whatever is used must be compatible with Map. The default implementation Vertex uses a HashMap. You are free to use any you prefer.

      • getColor

        public java.lang.String getColor()
        Get the color, according to CSS formats. By default, the color will be chosen at random. Setting the color to null or "" resets to defaults.
        Parameters:
        color - Color as a String
        See Also:
        Validation.validateColor(String)
